item.description:
This is a great way to meet new people, enjoy the outdoors year-round, attend social activities, and develop friendships that will last a lifetime!
Innitou Ski Runners was founded in 1938 and is part of the non-profit Eastern Inter-Club Ski League (EICSL). The club is centrally located in the heart of the White Mountain Valley in Glen, NH where there are countless number of ways to enjoy the outdoors year-round.
Joining this meetup will allow you to learn more about event filled weekends at the club, along with various activities planned in the Boston area. Club membership information is also available by contacting Gina. Membership to the club is 21+.
Many members live in the surrounding Boston area and gather throughout the year for various activities all over New England. Whether you are interested in heading north for Ski & other outdoor activities or getting out in the Boston area for some live music events, sporting events, local boat cruises, and so much more, we invite you to join this meetup to learn more.
We hope to meet you soon!
item.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England
